name: Mustang Survival Callan Jacket - Men's
description: A simple style for racing at your local regatta or spending your day paddling in a downpour. Waterproof and windproof, the fabric has stretch and breathability to promote activity and fluid motion.3-layer waterproof-breathable MarineSpec™ MP is soft and dynamic.Fitted hood ensures full peripheral vision.Adjustable cuffs to tune the fit.YKK® AquaGuard® zippers keeps moisture out.Water-resistant zippers.Cinch to fit, with an adjustable draw cord waist.Single chest pocket, 2 hand pockets.Internal hanging loop, for easy drying.Fully seam sealed to keep water from seeping in.
